timeline.message: Add architecture module with Hexagonal example
BAEL-4007 Add jpa data equality unit test specs

Merge pull request #3 from andrebrowne/BAEL-4077

BAEL-4007 Add jpa data equality unit test specs

timeline.bodyText: Please use braces in all if/else blocks, even on one-liners, as this is considered a best practice.
timeline.author: KevinGilmore
KevinGilmore

timeline.bodyText: opening brace should be at end of a line but not on a line by itself
timeline.author: KevinGilmore

timeline.bodyText: For wrapper classes, the == operator would only return true for values in the range -127 to 127. Should use the equals method to compare the ids.
timeline.author: KevinGilmore
